title: When you run Dota for the first time and you find out how good their client is

replies.body: Then you realize the art style is overall too dark, everything is hard to locate, and god forbid you don't minion block because it took you forever to find your starting items.
Not to mention every other patch breaks almost all custom games.

i played dota for 9 years before lol. but when i met lol i instant unistalled dota 2. that game suck so hard. bullshit. u can try it out tho xD.
i mean lol isnt balance has some broken champions and some broken items but dota is faaaaaaaaaaaaar from baalaance XD its just that dota really doesnt have a board for people to complain its bullshit man listen to me i played that game for 9 years of my life 24/7. if u are looking for balance thats not the game .
the only good thing about dota is client and thats all

I havn't said it's balanced, I have been playing it for few years. But it still have some kind of magic for me, similar to LoL. Anyway you are right, but I won't stop till I master Meepo :*, so forever probably.

Uhh, their client is convoluted nonsense that's a pain in the ass to navigate.  

Starting a game when I first got it took 10 minutes because the location of setting it up and the interface required is overly complicated and nonsenical.

1. Runs smoothly, so much better than LoL client
2. You can read guides while being in Q
3. You can watch proplay while being in Q
4. You can demo heroes while being in Q

You have big button in down right corner that says Play Dota, then you easily choose what game mode you want, probably bots when you started. But yeah, buggy sluggish primitive client is better to navigate through, when you have 10 secs to think about your next click, while waiting.
The girl is cute but I'm not sure it was the appropriate reaction...
